Sentencas: A composite electrolyte consisting of a samarium doped ceria and a binary eutectic carbonate phase is investigated in this work.
Titulo: Quantifying multi-ionic conduction through doped ceria-carbonate composite electrolyte by a current-interruption technique and product analysis

Sentencas: It has been found that O2-/H+ conductions take place when H-2 and O-2 used as the reactants.
Titulo: Quantifying multi-ionic conduction through doped ceria-carbonate composite electrolyte by a current-interruption technique and product analysis

Sentencas: The presence of CO2 in the cathode gas leads to the appearance of CO32- conduction.
Titulo: Quantifying multi-ionic conduction through doped ceria-carbonate composite electrolyte by a current-interruption technique and product analysis

Sentencas: The overall conductivity of the composite electrolyte is measured with a current-interruption technique and the ions transferred by O2-/H+/CO32- respectively are obtained by a quantitative measurement of the reaction products, i.e. H2O and CO2.
Titulo: Quantifying multi-ionic conduction through doped ceria-carbonate composite electrolyte by a current-interruption technique and product analysis

Sentencas: The change of the carbonate content in the composite electrolyte presents a great influence on the conductivity of each ion.
Titulo: Quantifying multi-ionic conduction through doped ceria-carbonate composite electrolyte by a current-interruption technique and product analysis

Sentencas: According to these experimental facts, the pathways for the individual ionic conductions are proposed.
Titulo: Quantifying multi-ionic conduction through doped ceria-carbonate composite electrolyte by a current-interruption technique and product analysis
